title: Girl Undone
description: TJ and Lisa are hired by a woman whose niece disappears under mysterious circumstances. TJ finds the girl after three days, unharmed. Or was she? Bodies start turning up around a local crime blogger as he receives mysterious emails hinting at a serial killer in progress. Will the blogger be the next victim? TJ suspects a tie to the other case and delves into the background of the woman who was abducted, searching for answers before a killer strikes again. Buy your copy of this exciting suspense thriller today, with twists and turns you wonâ€™t see coming!
author: Marla Madison
